text.tspan: 1. Find a tree and dig it to get wood (collect it)
2. Press E to open your inventory and drag the wood on to a single space in your
inventory crafting area. A stack of wooden planks will appear to the right which
you can now drag down back in to your inventory.
3. Now drag the stack of wooden planks back towards the 2x2 crafting grid but this
time dont let go of your mouse button, instead use the SPACEBAR to drop one
plank from the stack in to each of the 4 empty crafting squares. This will result in
a crafting table appearing to the right. Drag this to the bottom line of your inventory.
4. Press E to exit the inventory and then use the number keys to select the crafting
table in your quick select inventory bar. Click on an empty level square above a
ground tile to place the crafting table.
5. With your mouse over the crafting table, press E to open the extended crafting
screen. With the right recipes you can now craft bigger and better tools, etc...
